name: Correct answers to trend questions about basic scientific facts: 1992–2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: See notes to Table S7-1 for an explanation and a list of questions. See Table S7-26 and Table S7-27 for responses to individual questions.
